definition.name: Whittaker_model
definition.definition: For a generic representation Pi of GL_{n+1}(F), the psi^{-1}-Whittaker model W(Pi, psi^{-1}) is the space of functions W: GL_{n+1}(F) -> C satisfying W(ug) = psi^{-1}(u)W(g) for u in N_{n+1}, realized by applying the Whittaker functional to Pi.
